channel.title: Monster of the Week - Dark Times - September Series
channel.description:
* Huge solar storms during July 2012. Then the Sun never came up... * Location : New York City
• History Questions – One is from July-September. Now it’s October. • Each character has Alternative magic type from More Weirdness/Tome of Mysteries. • Only Spellslingers can start with regular Use Magic, other playbooks must take the Advancement “Take a move from another playbook"
* The game will be recorded on youtube via Streamyard. * The X-Card will be available.
**Details** - - Communication with Satellites is gone. This effects – Stock Market, National TV Stations, Vehicle GPS, Google Maps, Weather Forecasts. - Internet is slower-buffering for video is common. - Power-Electricity & Gas is still working. - Some towns & cities have Curfew 1-4am to save on power.
If you have any questions hit me up on gauntlet slack, forums or twitter @flyingfox369
1 - https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-Mday3ZLdMCVm1-KX5cU 2 - https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MdayZ-r4vR7HvGQJNNx 3 - https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MdazXKEAW0LJ4WjjOMe

item.title: Monster of the Week - Dark Times - September Series
item.dc:creator: @BlakeRyan
item.description:
@BlakeRyan wrote:

  • Huge solar storms during July 2012. Then the Sun never came up…
  • Location : New York City

• History Questions – One is from July-September. Now it’s October.
• Each character has Alternative magic type from More Weirdness/Tome of Mysteries.
• Only Spellslingers can start with regular Use Magic, other playbooks must take the Advancement “Take a move from another playbook"

  • The game will be recorded on youtube via Streamyard.
  • The X-Card will be available.

Details -

  • Communication with Satellites is gone. This effects – Stock Market, National TV Stations, Vehicle GPS, Google Maps, Weather Forecasts.
  • Internet is slower-buffering for video is common.
  • Power-Electricity & Gas is still working.
  • Some towns & cities have Curfew 1-4am to save on power.

If you have any questions hit me up on gauntlet slack, forums or twitter @flyingfox369
